tweet: .@rockenschtein Apparently Visio counted, even though it is a separate download package.
@rodcolledge Use the ones 1/2 way down mainstreet on the right hand so you don't have to go outside the park to get to your locker.
@rodcolledge Oh, and if you think you will need a locker get one early. They sell out quickly (not sure how quickly this time of year).
@rodcolledge You should now have sufficient info to take the place by storm, and give them all your money.
@rodcolledge Best not-expensive food in downtown disney (between the park and the parking lot) is La Brea bakery. Jazz kitchen is good to $$
